name: Dojigiri Yasutsuna [Serious]
skill: Deals 3417/4097 DMG to enemy with highest ATK, target receives more DMG for a limited time 45%/54%
ability: Sharply increases DMG dealt when one of the Five Swords under Heaven is on the team.

additional_data.description: The spirit of one of the Five Great Blades. After the you-know-what incident she’s been working with demons to restore Shuten Doji’s castle to its former glory. She used to get sent out on a lot of distant expeditions in the boonies, but lately she’s had jobs closer to home, which has given her more time with her beloved Shoten Doji. They say this was all Mikado’s doing, but she keeps her mouth firmly shut on the matter.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ Limited Jewel Summon from 30/8/2017 - 6/09/2017
◦ Trade at Exchange for 200 Mochi 6/09/2017
additional_data.notes_and_trivia:
◦ Summon rate increased until 6/09/2017
◦ Can only be exchanged once

main: "Cutting through evil is all I do these days!"
summon: "I could use your help, if you don't mind."
